name: Introduction to Physics
description: A basic overview of physics principles and concepts.

name: Kinematics and Dynamics
description: A study of the motion of objects and forces that act upon them.

name: Thermodynamics and Statistical Mechanics
description: A study of heat, its properties and its effects on matter.

name: Electromagnetism
description: A study of the interaction between electric and magnetic fields and forces.

name: Quantum Mechanics
description: A study of the behavior of matter and energy at the atomic and subatomic level.
